item.description:
Hi, folks,

A number of you have suggested that we meet regularly to get to know one another. Courtesy of Steven Flaherty, we now have a (free) place to meet. Thanks Steven! He has volunteered to get us a room at Worcester State College for our meetings.

This first meeting will be a planning meeting, where we can discuss the ideas that members have posted and plan investigations for the rest of the year. Please come with all of your ideas, ready to get us rolling through the fall and into the winter.

We can feast on pizza and share our experiences with the paranormal, neat new investigation equipment, and so on. After the meeting, depending on what the group wants to do, we could go to a movie or investigate the haunted tunnel in Clinton.
I'd be willing to lead a group there--it's not too far from Worcester.

WHEN: Sunday, September, 19th, 6-8pm

WHERE: Worcester State College (see directions below)

WHAT TO BRING: Whatever you want to share with the group: (ideas for meetups, equipment, evidence, brownies...) and a flashlight if you want to go to the tunnel

COST: $2.00 for pizza and soft drinnks

DIRECTIONS:
Worcester State College (Univerity)
486 Chandler St.
Worcester MA. 01602

from the north:

Rt. 2 East To 190 south

190 sonth to 290 east

290 east to exit 13 Kelly sq. ( 290 west to exit 13
Kelly sq. Turn left )

turn right go though kelly sq. to Madison St. (in btween the
Hess station and the Gulf)

Stay staight on Madison St . It turns into Chandler St. 2.5
miles on the left side you will be at the College.

Take the south enterance and go straigh though the blinking red
light. Go up the hill to the dorms.

At the top of the hill the building in front of you is called
Waslyean Hall. Go in the front door and
down the hall to Sevehill lounge.
See you there!



From 122 south:

Go through Paxton center by the Worcester airpor.t After the airport, go through the first set of lights
and turn right ongo Chandler St. Follow that straight to the
college on your right. Use the south enterance ( follow

above directions)

I look forward to seeing you there.

Sandy
item.name: Pizza party and planning meeting
